website_summaries.verdict: Ignore its crazy looks: The Zotac GeForce GTX 1080 Amp Extreme is a truly screaming video card ideal for any high-end gaming desktop.
pros: Heavily overclocked out of the box
Designed for cool and quiet operation
cons: Crazy design elements may not be for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Great card - but check box clearance
customer_reviews.text: For those unfamiliar with the brand - I've had a Zotac 560 Ti 448 in a media box for over 5 years with no issues. I trust this manufacturer. PROS: Great performance, No driver issues. CONS: Size. Takes up 2.5 slots and covers a PCIe 1x on my board. Solved with this Slot Riser  Take note - 12.8 inches long! That's almost 13 inches. Recommend you open your box and measure the clearance. Clearance in my mid-tower was a few millimeters short due to rivets, so this was a great excuse for a desired case upgrade. Weight is significant--I rigged support for the unmounted end.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome. Mine is over clocked to 2056mhz and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome. Mine is over clocked to 2056mhz and the cooling is so good that it only drops to 2013mhz under load. I probably would upgrade to the the Ti Version when ZOTAC comes out with one. Cant wait. This thing is HUGE however, do make sure you have a way to support this card because it will sag otherwise...
customer_reviews.author: jordan thompson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade! Excellent performance!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my gtx780. The card has such a large heat sink that the fans stay off till you get to mid 40c. The fans are pretty quiet under 80% and even with another card under this one the temps stay low. I then used my 780 as a physX card which some say is a waste, and it probably is, but it's brought up my minimum FPS by ~11 so I have no problem staying over 60 FPS in 4k in BF4 for example. Overclocked this card without any issues to 2205mhz well worth the upgrade if you have a 970 or older.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: This card works as it should on a windows 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: This card works as it should on a windows 7 pro box, but I get the error "video driver does not work with this version of windows". WTH? I'm using windows 10, 64 bit version. no answer back from Zotac. they list a driver that they say works, but when you try to load it, you get that error. windows 10 will switch to a generic driver.
customer_reviews.author: iturnwrenches

customer_reviews.title: The two paired together make for an amazing experience. It feels like I've rediscovered gaming all ...
customer_reviews.text: I went from a single ASUS Strix 970, to this absolutely monster of a card. I paid a little more for it, as prices were inflated when they were first released, but I don't regret it one bit. Clock speeds are outstanding, and I've yet to hit a thermal throttle temperature limit. I also invested in a 144hz 1440p monitor. The two paired together make for an amazing experience. It feels like I've rediscovered gaming all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Taylor

customer_reviews.title: ... EVGA GTX 970 SSC and so far its been great! I've been playing most of my games in ...
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a EVGA GTX 970 SSC and so far its been great! I've been playing most of my games in 4k max settings and been getting around 60fps. You won't be able to do that with all the AAA titles, but this thing is a beast. Definitely worth the upgrade! It also comes with some software to control the lighting with different effects.
customer_reviews.author: None Of Your Business

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance, Easy on Power Consumption (heat), Exhausts from case not into case. Nicely done.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in aging ASUS G20 to replace the GTX760. All the previous game crashes are gone and the frame rates are ridiculous. When combined with the Samsung 850 Pro SSD for the boot drive, this PC has a new lease on life.
customer_reviews.author: Zzyzx Oh

customer_reviews.title: I love this card
customer_reviews.text: I love this card, but now that Gears of War 4 is out, I am unsure how to get it since it supposedly came with the card. The box didn't have a leaflet and now I am concerned I won't get the free game. I paired this with a gsync 4K monitor. ASUS brand and it is quite lovely to see my favorite games on ultra settings!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: This is the best graphics card I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best graphics card I have ever used. I can play everything at max/ultra settings with ease. be warned though, this thing is massive. it barely fit into my case. make sure you check out the dimensions before purchasing, as I had no idea a component could be so large.
customer_reviews.author: Kende

customer_reviews.title: This was an awesome card- problem was it didn't fit in my mini-ITX ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome card- problem was it didn't fit in my mini-ITX case (CoolerMaster Elite 130)- too long and too thick. It was so nice, I considered hacking up my case, but I ended up returning it and buying a smaller EVGA GTX1080 SC which fit better.
customer_reviews.author: R. RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: BEAST
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that this thing is a beast. I am running 3 1080p monitors for all of my games and I'm getting crazy frame rates with most if not all settings on very high. Can't recommend this thing enough
customer_reviews.author: Murf

customer_reviews.title: love it. Sags a little but that's expected from ...
customer_reviews.text: Beast of a GPU, love it. Sags a little but that's expected from a monster sized card like this. Wish there were more lighting options but I usually keep it on green anyway.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unreal. This card runs cool and quiet and is an absolute monster in performance. I am running 4k on all my games at Max settings without a hitch!!
customer_reviews.author: Angry gamer

customer_reviews.title: This will run my games fine for years
customer_reviews.text: Fast and surprisingly quiet (having a sound-padded case helps). This will run my games fine for years.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: My Card's lighting went out  \/( -.-)\/
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these cards, and they perform as Sli 1080's should. However I cannot give these 5 stars because they are quite loud, and one of the cards' Lighting went out. When running these cards in SLI I can play Doom @ 1440p, 144fps, Maxed Settings. So I am happy with my gaming experience.
customer_reviews.author: joey feldhaus

customer_reviews.title: Size, size and more size!! CHECK!
customer_reviews.text: SERIOUSLY impressed although, it's HUGE! I ended up buying a new case to fit it and I already had a FULL tower case. Check your sizes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stuza

customer_reviews.title: GTX Zotac 1080 AMP EXTREME! review.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it almost constantly overclocks over 2ghz out of the box! Downfalls bad card sag had to buy brace to hold it in place. Tiny 24/7 over locking potential to ensure 2050hz (2.5ghz) but not really a bad thing but not a true manual over clocking card past 2050hz memory also can over clock to 300mhz. Otherwise a spectacular purchase!!!! I would recommend if you are going one 1080 go 2x 1080 no matter what brand. Otherwise wait for the TI.
customer_reviews.author: Nugget

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product ^^
customer_reviews.text: Over two years of use, and no issues yet, great product. :D
customer_reviews.author: CatsnRainbows

customer_reviews.title: Mine had an issue where the fan was constantly rubbing ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine had an issue where the fan was constantly rubbing on the wire, i had to open it and fix. other than that, appears to be decent. They need to double check these things, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs amazing! I play ark evolved most of the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs amazing! I play ark evolved most of the time which is a very graphically demanding game and this thing runs it on epic settings with no issues not mention stays around 60 degrees after hours of play which is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Gage Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Beastly card.
customer_reviews.text: This baby is bad!!! It can easily handle 4k gaming. And any decent CPU will have you set, save money.
customer_reviews.author: Wane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 1080! Best cooler and highest stock clocks so far from and 1080 this year
customer_reviews.text: Best 1080 out of the box so far. All 1080's can reach 2000Mhz with some overclocking but these cards with they're amazing coolers are running at 2065Mhz at less than 60deg C with 0 overclocking. Running demanding games at 4k at ultra settings over 30fps will require 2 cards but that's a very demanding task for any card. I compared these to a Titan Pascal and these are silent and the FPS difference was less than 8%. Great card for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Allergy reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse of a GPU. Running all of my Vive ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerhouse of a GPU. Running all of my Vive games at ~2.1 resolution via supersampling.
customer_reviews.author: JosephDove

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the GTX 1080 Founder's Edition and they have been running without a single problem in SLI. If i run into any problems i will update my review but so far i am very happy with the products.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Performance on this card is amazing, and I was able to get a pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Performance on this card is amazing, and I was able to get a pretty hefty overclock watercooled, but the card suffers from some terrible coil whine. It's not a huge deal, but still a potential annoyance if you sit close to your PC.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Pfund

customer_reviews.title: Good Card
customer_reviews.text: This card has one of the best air coolers on the market. I would highly recommend this card if you don't mind the interesting color chose. I would also recemend waiting for a sale like I did, because most gtx 1080's will overclock to about the same Hz. Over all good card, good cooler, okay value but would recommend get it while it's on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome card with cool LEDs. Better price than the MSI version.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr Mistiuk

customer_reviews.title: At the default frequency, there is a high probability ...
customer_reviews.text: At the default frequency, there is a high probability that the memory will overheat and cause a screen, which can only reduce the frequency of the memory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks bigger when holding it.
customer_reviews.text: Great for HTC Vive, fits perfectly in a Alienware Area 51 r2 case. I replaced my GTX 980 with this card and it made a huge difference in 4K gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Farpack

customer_reviews.title: Best gpu today
customer_reviews.text: Best reference card you can get amazed in every way with get a second hopefully for sli
customer_reviews.author: clinton jones

customer_reviews.title: It worked better then I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: It worked better then I thought it would. Plays my games pretty smoothly, batman plays full 90 fps with little to know frame drops. The recent batman. It's just an overall improvement over the 970 I had.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Its, Really a monster i just bought two.
customer_reviews.text: Its, Really a monster i just bought two. With bitspower water block and its very powerfull im overclocking +100mhz and its very stable Thank you zotac
customer_reviews.author: metub

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: A great product does everything i expected and then some. Looks cool and stays cool, got to me just when it said it would. I love this graphics card!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: No issues with gaming so far and is pretty quiet to my ears
customer_reviews.text: Placed it inside an HAF XB case from Cooler Masters. Fits snugged. No issues with gaming so far and is pretty quiet to my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Bon K.

customer_reviews.title: Wholeheartedly recommend this card!
customer_reviews.text: I love this card. Being able to raid in MMO's with all of the graphic settings at max and not experiencing any significant drop in frame rate is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic video card. This made me a ZOTAC believer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my GTX970 and what a difference. The 970 could play almost everything with high or ultra settings but I didn't notice the low fps I was getting before. This made a huge difference and I know it'll be "future-proof" for around 5 years or so. Super easy install going from Nvidia to Nvidia. Just had to let GeForce Experience update the driver, restart the computer a couple times and thats it. Absolutely no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Card
customer_reviews.text: As usual zotac products don't disappoint. Just upgraded from a Zotac 980 to this Zotac 1080 and I love it. Looks are incredible, packaging was great and product works like a charm. Thanks Zotac! Participating in ZOTAC Experience
customer_reviews.author: Blake C. Louviere

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but big.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome graphics card. Fans don't turn on until needed so very quite. Though it's about an inch longer than most boards, so make sure your case can take it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best out there right now for gameing.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it does very well in 1440p gaming. I would by a another one for sli.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great card I been playing Escape from Tarkov and Star Citizen with no problem currently have 4.6ghz i7 6700k
customer_reviews.author: Macarenas

customer_reviews.title: Would say this is the best aftermarket cooler 1080 but zotac needs to make the ...
customer_reviews.text: started to have stability issues after a few months randomly then started to cause freezing
customer_reviews.author: cathleen howard

customer_reviews.title: It's not much better than any other card though
customer_reviews.text: At a proper price, it's worth it. It's not much better than any other card though, so you might want to get one cheaper anyway. If you can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome card! Bulletproof!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this card so much, I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GTA 5 4k Ultra setting avg 45 - 50 fps ...
customer_reviews.text: GTA 5 4k Ultra setting avg 45 - 50 fps GTA 5 4k Ultra setting with Natural vision 2.1 avg 30 - 40 fps Crysis 3 4k Ultra setting avg 28-35 fps Fractures Space 4k Ultra setting avg 50 - 60 fps Overwatch 4k Ultra setting with Vsync avg 50 -59 fps, without Vsync avg 130 - 140 fps Conclusion: needs another one to play Crysis 3 on ultra in order to acheive higher fps. You don't need this card if you play on 1080p.
customer_reviews.author: James Wang

customer_reviews.title: I really need to take a dump
customer_reviews.text: Playing games maxed out at 4k with ease. This with an i5 6600k @ 4.2ghz and 32gb 3000mhz destroys all things and causes extreme memes to be born. I really need to take a dump. Immediately upon unpackaging, one can tell that beast is built with top notch, quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: It fits! Barely...
customer_reviews.text: Granted I had to use a Dremel tool to cut a hole in the side of the case to make room for the cords, but it actually fits inside of a Corsair Carbide Air 240 Mini-Tower Case It fit very comfortably inside the Corsair carbide's big brother as well, though I had to move the tripple radiator forward and fans to the outside of the case. This made for a way awesomer look anway, just a heads-up for anyone using that case with a vertical radiator, you don't have room for this card and it and the fans. Not a bad thing. It's a big honkin card and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian S. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Normally I like ZOTAC! But this product went defective on me ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally I like ZOTAC! But this product went defective on me after a very short time. It looks cool, it's quiet, it's very fast, but it died on me after like a month. Not acceptable for a $700 video card.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Constantine

customer_reviews.title: BAMF
customer_reviews.text: This thing is MASSIVE! IT looks super cool, but I have not installed it yet. I am sure it will go above and beyond my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: The Daydreaming Warrior Poet

customer_reviews.title: so the temperature should be better.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product couple days ago. This GPU is a badass... I am being able to achieve over 100 fps in my 1440p @144hz monitor. This was a major update for Nvidia GTX 780... As for the temperature, it is a bit issue since it's the founder edition, so it has nothing to do with Zotac itself. But I am planning to install an waterblock on it, so the temperature should be better.
customer_reviews.author: diego

customer_reviews.title: and so far it has produced amazing results in the quality of the video feeds it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and works as promised. This video card is used to supplement the image processing power in one of our spy satellites along the Klingon border, and so far it has produced amazing results in the quality of the video feeds it can process and forward on to the Tal Shiar.
customer_reviews.author: Pholodius Probical

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great graphics card then try the liquid cool 1080. Very awesome!
customer_reviews.author: tinman

customer_reviews.title: I think this card had so much potential and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this card had so much potential and I have a 980ti zotac arctic storm that has been never-failing so far. I bought two to put in SLI and one was dead on arrival and the other leaked within two weeks. I would avoid until the water block is re-designed. The cards were returned and I'm now on the hunt again. MSI seahawk may be the next thing I try.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding GPU but delivery sucks
customer_reviews.text: Great GPU arrived but it wasn't on time those idiot dropped it off at community post office and so it took awhile if I didn't call they would held it for awhile. Other than that this baby runs smooth I can now max out any game setting and there will be no lag or fps issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zotac + Amazon customer service warrants low rating-
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I would not go for another ZOTAC. It failed in their RMA - under warranty, no overclocks done Even though I received a faulty item from them out of the box,- They will charge you to ship it back to you. Word of warning - make sure you benchmark it properly with kombuster/furmark etc and let AMAZON worry about it. Amazon's return policy is BS as well- 30 days. You may have my money now, but I won't be returning given this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST O. M. G. 100% worth the ...
customer_reviews.text: JUST O . M . G . 100% worth the purchase and waiting time, such a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Anlauf

customer_reviews.title: Amp bois and grills
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best. Can run a copy of the matrix at 300fps.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Rooks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Same performance as other founder editions and cheaper than those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Card, Plan on getting another.
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting for these cards to get back in stock. Saw that this was in stock and snagged it. performs amazingly and I can't wait until the steam summer sale in a few days for some new games to play! :D Pros: Easy install. Straight Forward, no fluff. Cons: Paid 50$ more than the same card by other manufacturers. ***Participating in ZOTAC Experience
customer_reviews.author: Jose Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Great until it died within 4 months :(
customer_reviews.text: Researched the video card extensively and decided on the ZOTAC 1080. Purchased the video card for $729.99 on September 21, 2016. We were extremely happy with our purchase and it worked great until it failed on January 6, 2017. I'm a loyal Amazon Prime customer hoping to get a replacement from Amazon or the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: No thrills reference design. Didn't come with a game ...
customer_reviews.text: No thrills reference design. Didn't come with a game or any extras. Runs solid and haven't found anything that will choke it. Feels very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Gtx 1080 review, pre-ordered correct price. Don't overpay.
customer_reviews.text: Huge upgrade from my 970 ftw+ which only handled 1440p ultrawide at 50fps avg max settings. This was able to get over 100fps avg same settings at stock clock single card.Can't hear any coil whine during stress. My main reason for the card though is VR. My Vive is arriving in 2 days and I'll update on VR performance later. Update:Tested in steamVR, no lag/studders or frames below 90. SteamVR performance rated 11 maxed out green. Very satisfied with the card.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After using 8 months of the video card has broken appeared artifacts and unfortunately the factory defect
customer_reviews.author: mishavaiper

customer_reviews.title: GPU SAG IS INSANE, BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three stars not based on the performance, performance is amazing BUT! this card is huge! the sag is very very prominent. I'm scared it destroys my $350 motherboard by ripping the socket. I think I may return it and get something...normal.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only one day used, extremely hot, broke the motherboard and psu Aug 31, 2016: amazon refund to me only the card
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No overclocking, no custom cooling and pay $900+ for this? No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Azizkhan

product_meta.title: ZOTAC GeForce GTX 1080 ArcticStorm 8GB GDDR5X VR Ready Liquid Cooling Waterblock, Spectra Lighting, Metal Wraparound Backplate, Direct Copper Contact Gaming Graphics Card (ZT-P10800F-30P)
product_meta.description:
Style:ArcticStorm Edition 



ArcticStorm

 Slim profile making it thinner than the PCI bracket

 Fitted with a direct copper cold block for maximum heat extraction

 0.3mm precision micro-channels for supercharged heat transfer

 Made of lightweight aluminum materials for a lighter card

 Full waterblock coverage covering the entire length of the board for maximum flow path





SPECTRA Lighting System

 Customize the look with a color to match your system using the redesigned FireStorm Utility

 8 brightness levels

 Different lighting modes

 Static: Always on one color

 Breathe: Fade in and out a static color

 Strobe: Quickly flash off and on a static color

 Cycle: Breathe in and out and changes color each time it fades in

 Saved Spectra Settings: Settings are saved to the graphics card and are automatically enabled when powered on




Metal Wraparound Backplate : Wraparound coverage for extended protection



PowerBoost

 Special capacitors designed to withstand high voltage and extreme temperatures

 Reduce fluctuation of incoming power to minimize power fluctuation

 Stabilize high speed performance



Simultaneous Multi-Projection

VR Ready

NVIDIA Ansel

NVIDIA SLI w/ HB Bridge Support

NVIDIA G-Sync 

NVIDIA GameStream 



SPECIFICATIONS

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 GPU

2560 CUDA cores

8GB GDDR5X memory

256-bit memory bus

Engine clock (base): 1632 MHz. (boost): 1771 MHz

Memory clock: 10 GHz

PCI Express 3.0

Fitting: G1/4 Thread. 2 x Barbs included (10mm ID Tube support)



CONNECTIONS

3 x DisplayPort 1.4

1 x HDMI 2.0b

1 x Dual-link DVI

Quad simultaneous display capable



POWER REQUIREMENTS

500-watt power supply recommended

2 x 8-pin PCI Express power connectors



SOFTWARE COMPATIBILITY

NVIDIA GeForce driver

Microsoft DirectX 12 

OpenGL 4.5 / OpenCL

Microsoft Windows 10/8/7 x86/x64




INSIDE THE BOX

ZOTAC GeForce GTX 1080 ArcticStorm

2 x Dual 6-pin to 4x2-pin power cable

2 x G1/4 Thread 3/8" Fitting (10mm ID Tube support)

User Manual

Driver disc
feature_bullets: Extended warranty included with every graphics card purchase. User registration required on ZOTAC website.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars276 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
